name: Half-Life 2: Deathmatch

reviews:
8/10

Half Life Deathmatch basically is Half Life but multiplayer and Deathmatch, believe it or not. Servers have the expected chaos in them, with people using the gravity gun to yeet radiators into their opponent's cranium, which will forever be the most humourous thing to be a feature in a multiplayer game. All of this can probably be done in Gmod but this game's community has it's own fun charm to it, so I recommend checking this game out if you can. Of course the game is Multiplayer only, and some servers are more like Gmod servers rather than Deathmatch servers, but getting into the right server can result in you having a blast so yeah.

the mechanics of this game is beyond anything you can find on ALL other FPS games. Forget graphics and RTX light and "cosmetics". Half-Life 2 Deathmach (AKA simply dm) has the rules of "nature" and the tools combination to find yourself in a totally unique situation and ALWAYS extremely comic. For example in lockdown there is a half height wall at the washing hall. I was on one side of the wall my friend on the other. we could not see eachother but we both balance the situation on what to do. I just grab with the gravity gun a "lavomano" bring it upper from the wall to the other side and without seeing where is my friend I just launched it to his face. He just saw a "lavomano slowly passing over the wall, getting right in his face and launched.

---------------------------------

BUT, never forget the really poor behavior of the dm creators that they totally abandon their creativity to just make a global "hats" casino, unregulated and accessible to children. So politically I would not support them. The game on the other hand has never, I mean NEVER being surpassed from another game.
